updates: Added the ability to send and receive emails
Entropy of 20 bits is added to passwords
Added salt for generate new password with login information
Updated to gopeer v1.1.2 (fix file transfer, packet size limit)
Updated to gopeer v1.1.1 (information duplication vulnerability fixed)
Added function to view archives of other users
Added functions to download and upload files from nodes
GUI is now based on single page
Requests to client throw API over HTTP/S, WS/S
Requests to network throw Packages over TCP
